dialogues.text: RATA-TAT-TAT!!! Everyone opens fire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matheson moans and groans behind Saul, who is staring at Dale's motionless body. Horrified, he flips Dale over...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's alive! The top of his left ear has been blown off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale? You're alive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul analyzes Dale's wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They got your ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind Saul, Matheson tries to stand up, but immediately falls back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (difficulty hearing) My what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here. Get up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul helps Dale stand up, freeing his hands. Dale feels his ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in pain)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale turns to the injured Matheson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Saul) You shot me..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Matheson)                                Well, you kneed my balls!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You shot him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale notices Saul is holding a gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale turns to Matheson, who has stopped moving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh...stay there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They walk out the door and cautiously enter the forest of weed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Asians riddle the barn with bullets as they scream at Ted and his men in Korean. The remaining thugs scamper about, returning fire to the Asians. Ted and Carol hide behind a vehicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On three.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One, two, three!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carol and Ted pop up and unload their guns, hitting several of their assailants. They watch in horror as several more creep in through the hole the Escalade made.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You go down. I'll take care of this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted nods as Carol steps out from behind her cover and nails several assassins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RAT-A-TAT-TAT!!! Carol is shot several times in the chest! She lurches backwards, but does not fall. Her bullet proof vest has taken the bullets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ARGGG!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carol continues firing and kills another attacker as Ted runs for the trap door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale and Saul slowly make their way through the dense marijuana foliage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at all this fucking weed, man. Where the hell are we? Is this some underground weed city we don't know about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul suddenly GRABS Dale and pulls him down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) What's that noise?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) I don't know! That guy just blew half my fucking ear off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointing across the room) There's some dudes in here. I saw them                 when I got dragged down. And there's some              kind of super-suit or something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Were they armed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering)                                    I don't think so.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! Dale and Saul both scramble along a row of weed planets as bullets ricochet all around them. They continue running and then stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't hear them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul spots an air vent in the middle of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You could boost me up! We'll sneak out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! BLAM! They are being shot at again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoot back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul hesitantly takes aim and pulls the trigger. BLAM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They run and turn several corners when Saul suddenly trips over a dead thug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice. You got him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale picks up the thug's machine gun. Suddenly, a thug appears behind Saul.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lance? Holy fuck! You sons-of-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale shoots right over Saul's shoulder and nails the thug several times.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy shit. I killed him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About time you killed somebody. You're                 the one whose supposed to be saving me,                and I`ve killed two bad guys already.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul looks to the vent in the middle of the room. Dale looks at the pipe, sizes up Saul and himself, and takes a deep breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll never be able to pull me up, but                I'll boost you up there and you just                   fucking run for it, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? No fucking way, Dale. What about                 you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale cocks his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa. That was awesome.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul tucks the gun in his belt and awkwardly climbs atop Dale's shoulders and tears the vent off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a good man, Dale Denton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul lifts himself in. SUDDENLY, Dale sees Ted enter the room and immediately go for his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wha-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale walks out from under Saul, raises his gun, and unloads - RATA-TAT-TAT!!! Ted ducks as the plants around him are torn asunder. Dale runs out of ammo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! Ted shoots at Saul, who narrowly avoids the gunfire as he pulls himself into the vent. Ted redirects his attention to Dale, who is running through the bushes. Ted blasts off a few shots before Dale vanishes into the foliage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Denton!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul wiggles his way through the vent. He turns a corner and-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a skeleton wedged in the vent. A grate leading out is directly above the corpse. Saul squeamishly crawls over the skeleton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ew. Gross, man. A fuckin' dead guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He spots dog tags around it's neck as he crawls by. They read: Private Greg B. Miller.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thirty feet from the barn there is an air vent sticking out of the ground. The top flies off and Saul emerges. He flops onto the ground, then immediately scampers to his and pulls out his gun. Saul looks to the open road to freedom, then back at the barn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale frantically runs through the rows of plants, when SUDDENLY he sees the strange scuba suit out of the corner of his eye and swings his gun at it, nearly opening fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering)                                 Oh god.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale slows down to catch his breath, staring at the strange scuba suit. Then, he gets an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON: Ted, quietly walking through the room

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted raises his gun as he spins around a corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you, you son-of-a-bitch?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted turns another corner and sees the strange scuba suit. He starts to walk past it, when he stops himself. He creeps back and looks at it, suspicious. He walks closer, breathing as quietly as he can, his gun clenched tightly. He slowly reaches his hand out to lift the face-hatch. He gently takes hold of the latch and is about to open it, when-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale jumps out from behind him and swings a FIRE EXTINGUISHER at Ted's face - SLAM!!! Ted drops his gun as he falls to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted leaps upwards and uppercuts Dale hard!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul inches towards the barn, hearing a melee of gunfire and screams as he nears it. He cautiously peers in and watches as Carol shoots an assassin in the chest then spins around and shoots at another assassin who desperately runs with a METAL BRIEFCASE handcuffed to his wrist. Carol hits him several times; he lurches over and falls through the trap door. She smiles and drops her empty gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul watches Carol as she heads towards the trap door. He takes a deep breath and CHARGES into the barn, unleashing a barrage of bullets at her! BLAM BLAM BLAM! CLICK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLICK. CLICK. None of the bullets hit her. She turns and sees Saul, who drops his empty gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck tha po-lice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both SCREAM in rage and CHARGE, fists flying as they collide. Carol whips Saul around by his collar and hurls him to the ground. She runs up and kicks him in the gut, time and time again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a fucking cop, you moron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul leaps to his feet and PUNCHES Carol in the face. He PUNCHES her again. She reaches for her mace, so Saul kicks her in the groin and grabs it for himself, then sprays her in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLAM! He punches her in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted and Dale are squared off. Both are bloody lipped and bruised. Dale continuously shucks and jives on the spot as they talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't fucking take me. I'm young.                  Virile. Prime of my life. You're old. Old              and dying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know who you are, Denton, or why               you're trying to ruin my life, but you're              fuckin' dead!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted rips off his shirt, revealing dozens of fearsome tattoos and scars. Dale quickly picks a grow light up off the ground. Ted does the same. The humming of the grow lights is heard as the two men walk in a circle, squared off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both swing and their grow lights collide, sending shards of glass everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both receive several small cuts. The immediately charge at each other and are soon grappling on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carol writhes on the ground as Saul runs towards her with a plank of wood. SMASH! He shatters it over her head. Carol drops, unconscious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul drops to his knees, exhausted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crazy  huff   huff , psycho bitch...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Saul!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul turns around to see Matheson clutching his bleeding gut with one hand and a loaded gun with the other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I owe you one. In the gut. Then the                   balls, and then the-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRASH!!! Red's car SMASHES through the side of the barn and SLAMS into Matheson, PULVERIZING him!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It lurches to a stop directly ON TOP OF THE HATCH leading underground. Red steps out of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Matheson's corpse)                         You just got killed by a Ford Fiesta                  motherfucker!!! How you like me now!?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: R...Red?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul! `sup! Dude, me and that Dale guy                are rescuing you. And getting revenge on              those whose shot us in the gut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! Red gets shot in the gut and drops!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul spins around to see Carol standing behind him, a machine gun aimed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted and Dale grapple violently on the ground. His gut jiggles as he lunges forwards, punching Dale in the throat! Dale falls to his knees, gasping for air. Ted kicks him in the head and picks up his GUN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barely alive, the Asian Assassin with the briefcase drags himself down the corridor and enters the grow room. He opens the briefcase and we see that it is a bomb. The assassin inserts a key.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted stands over Dale, aims the gun to his head, and-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KA-BOOM!!! THE BRIEFCASE EXPLODES!!!. Flames sweep over the room as Dale rolls for cover. Ted gets blasted back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul tries to be brave as Carol takes final aim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now prepare to eat shit and die-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KABOOM!!! The explosion BURSTS UP from the hatch with incredible force. Saul and Carol get blown back as Red's Ford Fiesta is sent flying up in the air. The flaming car lands DIRECTLY on Carol and explodes. The entire barn is now engulfed in flames.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The air thick with weed smoke, Dale slowly rises to his feet. He sees Ted slumped against the wall, dead, partially aflame. Dale walks over to Ted's body and takes the gun out of his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, Ted...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls a small BLUE ENVELOPE out of his pocket and drops it on Ted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...but you've been served.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale turns to see the exit blocked by a wall of fire. The air is thick with smoke and he can barely breath. Dale looks around desperately. He spots the FIRE EXTINGUISHER. He looks at the flames. He takes a deep breath, picks up the fire extinguisher, hurls it with all his might at the fire, and then quickly whips out his gun and shoots at it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! He hits the extinguisher and it explodes, blasting out the fire in the hallway towards the barn. Dale runs like hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he bolts down the hallway, the flames rush back in and chase after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The barn starts to buckle, when Dale suddenly leaps out of the trap door, flames licking his heels. Coughing profusely, Dale stands in the barn, then realizes his pants are on fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy fuck! Holy fuck! Aaaahhhh!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale wriggles out of his pants and kicks them away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow. Ah. Ow. Okay... cough   cough

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He starts to walk out of the barn when he suddenly trips over someone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs one of the unconscious Saul's feet and starts to drag him out of the barn. Just a they exit, the barn COLLAPSES in on itself, crumbling into a massive heap of burning wood. Dale pulls Saul onto the grass. Saul starts coughing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul!  Cough   Cough  You're okay!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (confused) Cough   Cough  What the fuck happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We... Cough ...we did it. We beat them. We won.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No fucking way. Seriously? (pointing at the fire) How did that happen?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have absolutely no idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They were fighting Asian dudes, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asian dudes? So, okay...maybe this is                  revenge for that Asian dude I saw Ted                  kill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So we're, like, in a drug war. That's                  cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's cool is that you came back for me               man. You did, right? You weren't just                  captured again, were you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hell no! I was scott-free. But how the                 hell was I going to leave you there after              you came to save me? Fuck that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They take a few deep breathes and each cough a bunch. Suddenly, they see something moving in the rubble. RED emerges, lightly crisped with his clothes on fire. He roles around in the dirt trying to put himself out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Motherfuckers. Motherfuckers. Light me on              fire? Kill my Fiesta? Fuckers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red? You okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red pats out the flames and stands up, all charred and covered in dirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck yeah, I'm fine. I'm Red. You're                   makin' me feel like a broken record. Now               can we get the fuck out of this shit                   hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all stand up. Red puts his arms around Dale and Saul for support. They start to hobble towards the forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SAUL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What should we do now? Can we go home?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DALE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've gotta get downtown, try and win Angie back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SAUL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell her you cut off your ear for her, like that crazy artist. (beat)                                       But, seriously dude, your joking right?             She'll never take you back, ever. Just              grow up and date a woman your own age.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DALE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you think we should have looked for the ear? They probably could've re-                 attached it, eh? I mean, this ear thing kind of fucking sucks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god, they blew your ear off, man!             Fuck that's gross. Can you dudes switch             sides? I don't want to look at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SAUL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, man. Look at Evander Holyfield, he looks totally normal. And plus, I saw this thing on the Discovery Channel, they can actually grow ears, like, in a petri dish, or even on the side of a mouse. And you only need half of one. It'll be a fuckin' cinch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DALE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just realized I've 100% lost my job by now. I haven't called in for days.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SAUL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who fuckin' cares? I thought you wanted to be a talk radio dude anyways? And, like, I never said anything, but you do have the voice. Like, when I didn't know what you did, I kind of thought you might have been doing cartoon voices, you know, like that Shrek shit, and that's why you wore a suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do have a good talk radio voice. I              love that shit, too. I...wait, say                  something again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're that dude whose always calling                 KSTAR about havin' two garbage days. I                totally agree with you, man. I work out               of my house, and it's, like, one of my                main concerns, garbage pile up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul, what're you going to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Work at a bong shop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm still selling weed. Fuck you guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They walk together in silence, delighted at their new prospects. After a brief moment, Saul suddenly seems afraid. He starts nervously looking back towards the barn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you hear something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale motions at his wounded ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All I hear is ringing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude, I'm kind of freakin' out. Like...I don't know...like, there might be someone out there. I mean...how do we know we got them all?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck are you guys talkin' about?             I don't hear shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale starts getting nervous, but tries to hide it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well...the barn did collapse in a ball of fire, and we probably each inhaled about ten pounds of weed smoke, so...it's just, you know-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale suddenly looks over his shoulder, but sees nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...a little paranoia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saul grabs Dale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) Stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They freeze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering)                                      Are you guys fuckin' with me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) What-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SAUL                               RED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering)                      (whispering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sshh!                             Sshh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) What is-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) Sshh! Can you hear that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering)                                      Oh fuck. I'm freakin' out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) Just listen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dale listens intently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) I literally only hear ringing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stand in silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck this noise!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red pushes himself off Dale and Saul and run into the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm following him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! Me too!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the barn's flaming remains the only light in sight, Dale and Saul run off into the endless, dark country side. And as enchanting music fills the air, we humbly...
